front.title: •Weapon Of A Sith
front.gametext: Plays on table. For opponent to steal a weapon from target character using a non-[Episode I] card, must first draw destiny. If destiny +1 > target's ability, weapon is stolen. Otherwise, attempt fails and stealing card is placed out of play.
front.lore: In order to use his double-bladed weapon Maul trained under Darth Sidious for years.

counterpart: Only Jedi Carry That Weapon - Defensive Shield
